content: sunburst rounds - dishcloth or coaster these items are fun to make give an amazing result and are a welcome gift or giveaway for various purposes either as dishcloth for the kitchen or bath or as coaster for indoors or outdoors fig 1- finished item right side fig 2 - finished item wong side see also hint at end of instructions the dishcloth and coaster use the same pattern except the hanger for the dishcloth they just vary in the weight of yarn and the corresponding hook since i hate weaving in ends i included some hints how to minimize the loose ends by crocheting them in
